description:
Derrick is fresh out of graduate school. Right after he finished, he packed up his car and decided to take off on the open road.
"I literally loaded my car with camping equipment and took off," he said. "If I like a spot… I camp there."
"Does it get lonely?" I asked. "Travelling by yourself?"
"Not at all," he replied. "I usually make friends along the way."
He kind of blushed when he said that. I always think it's cute when they get embarrassed about their hook ups!
"Plus, I travelled all the time when I was a kid," he said. "So I'm used to it."
"Why? Was your dad in the military?"
"Nope," he said. "They were hippies. Hardcore. Nothing but organic food and all that."
Slowly, Derrick was coming out of his shell.
He told us that he gets pretty aggressive in bed. His favorite thing: "My nipples are really sensitive. I love to have them licked and bitten!"
title: Derrick
